title: From Adam to Abraham
summary: This chapter traces the genealogy from Adam to the descendants of Esau. It lists major ancient peoples and connects the early world history to the Israelite line through Abraham.

faq.question: Why are genealogies important in the Bible?
faq.answer: They establish the historical and covenantal lineage leading to Israel and God's promises.
